name: One Run - Galway Game Jam 13
description:
Welcome to One Run!

Can you outrun the block of death that is slowly coming towards you! Ahhh! 

Click that one white square in the middle of the screen... depending on how much you keep the mouse down upon clicking it will determine if you Run, Jump, or Run Back but do not let the whole square be revealed or you shall be plunged into darkness!!!!
